WorkItem.Description:
When we use soap.fetch method to retrieve lookup values, it is not giving correct values.

Ex: Name is empty
     Type contains attribute type instead of entity logical name.
     Id coming correctly.


Has anyone observed this change? it is different from earlier versions.
WorkItem.Summary: Lookup name,id,typename are not coming properly with crm2015 sp1

Comments.Message:
Hi There.

SP1 introduced some changes to SOAP messages and the issue has been reported by another ticket. 

I am currently looking into the issue and try to provide an small update release as soon as possible.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
Please download v2.2.1 for this fix
I have not noticed this issue until now. We made the jump to CRM 2016 and this issue presents itself when using SOAP.Retrieve. Has there been a fix introduced yet?
Disregard my last message. I just noticed the 2.2.1 version comment.  Thanks.
